title: I cant read any discussions/topics on the boards
body: I've been trying to find an answer to this and have found no result. No matter what recent or old topics I find, (save for the old forums) I can never see anyone's posts. All I can see is the title of the discussion and that's it. Any reason for this or possible solutions?

replies.body: This could be happening for a few reasons, like an issue with an extension or even caching.  I recommend disabling any add-ons to your browser to troubleshoot, or even try Incognito.  You should also clear up your [cache ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies)to give your browser a fresh state.  Hope that helps (and that you see this)!
